Golurk

Type HP Attack Defense Speed Special Attack Special Defense Total
89 124 80 55 55 80 483
#365 0' 11.0"
727.51 lbs. 		Automaton Pokémon Golurk were created to protect people and Pokémon by an ancient civilisation. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Iron Fist 7 Powers up punching moves.
1 Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
18 No Guard 8 The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.
36 Sturdy 7 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
54 Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
72 Unseen Fist 8 Moves that make direct contact can attack the target even if the target protects itself.
90 Rock Head 6 Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
100 Clear Body 5 Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 01 Battle Armor 2 Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Disc 03 Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
Disc 05 Immunity 4 The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.
Disc 15 Lightning Rod 7 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Electric-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
Disc 20 Sand Force 7 Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
Disc 25 Levitate 8 By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
Disc 42 Sand Stream 9 The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.
Disc 51 Cecity -3 This Pokémon's poor eyesight makes its moves more likely to miss.
Disc 59 Stamina 7 Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Bare Hands 6 Boosts the base power of the Pokémon's attacks if they are not holding an item.
Bulletproof 8 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
Butterfingers -2 The Pokémon may drop its held item when hit by a damaging move.
Clear Body 5 Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.
Contrary 12 Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
Filter 7 Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
Ghastly Guard 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Eerie Terrain.
High Entropy 5 Boosts the Pokémon's Evasiveness under Gravity.
Insomnia 5 The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
Iron Fist 7 Powers up punching moves.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Mummy 8 Contact with the Pokémon changes all attacker's Abilities to Mummy.
No Guard 8 The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.
Rock Head 6 Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
Sand Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a sandstorm.
Shadow Shield 8 Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Sturdy 7 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
Terralate 8 Normal-type moves become Ground-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Terrorize 8 Normal-type moves become Ghost-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Tinted Lens 7 The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unseen Fist 8 Moves that make direct contact can attack the target even if the target protects itself.
Eerie Surge 9 Turns the ground into Eerie Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
